content.text: SAP HANA XSA/ABAP Programming Model Developer
Object Oriented Programming (S.O.L.I.D. concepts, Design Patterns, Class, Interface, Inheritance and Polymorphism)
ABAP/WF/Fiori development for modules PP, MM, SD, CO, FI, PS, QM, PM, WM
Agile methodologies - SCRUM, eXtreme Programming, Kanban, and TDD
